name: The Pioneers
wikiSummary: A printing error caused this song to be labelled 'The Pioneers' rather than the intended 'Pioneers'.  "Pioneers" is a single by Bloc Party from their debut album Silent Alarm. It was released in the UK by Wichita Records on 18 July 2005.  A cover of this song was later released by bands such as the Mystery Jets and Tunng.  the video was made by the company "mini vegas" and directed by aoife mcardle
wikiText:
A printing error caused this song to be labelled 'The Pioneers' rather than the intended 'Pioneers'.
 
 "Pioneers" is a single by Bloc Party from their debut album Silent Alarm. It was released in the UK by Wichita Records on 18 July 2005.
 
 A cover of this song was later released by bands such as the Mystery Jets and Tunng.
 
 the video was made by the company "mini vegas" and directed by aoife mcardle
